name: Metal Import Warehouse
unlockCondition: 18,000,000 ducats total wealth, Blacksmith Guild connection
calculationsAnalysis: The Metal Import Warehouse represents critical infrastructure for industrial materials. The construction cost of 3,800,000 ducats reflects the specialized heavy-duty storage and handling facilities required, while the income of 40,000 ducats (1.05% return) represents the handling fees for essential industrial metals. The maintenance cost of 28,000 ducats (70% of income) balances profitability with the reality of maintaining specialized heavy-duty facilities. The employment capacity of 20 represents the specialized staff needed to handle, assess, and distribute industrial metals. The construction time of 10 days (864000000ms) represents a significant industrial construction project.
shortDescription: Specialized facility for importing, storing, and distributing metals for Venice's industries.
fullDescription: Supporting Venice's shipbuilding, weapons manufacturing, and construction industries, these specialized warehouses handle imported metals from across Europe. Featuring reinforced floors to support heavy materials, specialized handling equipment, and secure storage for precious metals, these facilities employ metallurgical experts who can assess quality and purity. The substantial security measures reflect both the value of precious metals and the strategic importance of industrial metals to Venice's military and commercial power.
